com.sun.media.jsdt.impl

Class TargetableThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.sun.media.jsdt.impl.TargetableThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSDTDebugFlags, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class TargetableThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements JSDTDebugFlags, java.io.Serializable
    A Thread class that is targetable. In other words, this class retains a handle to the Runnable object that was used to create it. This is so that that thread can be shutdown gracefully.
    Since:
    JSDT 2.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
